Some time ago, a website talked about the dangers of sharing your location on the internet. The website said that when you share where you are, you are also telling everyone else where you are. This might not be a good idea because not everyone you meet online is a good person.
Many people share things on the internet, like photos and stories. But sometimes they realize that the internet is a big and complicated place, and it's easy to get lost. This can be sad, but it's not the end.
There were some people who were the first to use the internet, and they learned a lot about what to be careful of. They shared their experiences on the internet, and now we can learn from them.
One of the first people to share their life on the internet was a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall. He started sharing his life on the internet in 1994. He shared photos, stories, and even art. People liked his site, but sometimes he got into trouble. He fell in love and wrote about it on his site, but his girlfriend didn't like it. She told him to stop sharing his life on the internet or she would leave him.
Another person who shared her life on the internet was Heather Armstrong. She wrote about her job and her life, but someone sent her blog to her boss and she lost her job. This is what happens when we share too much online. We might think we can say anything online, but we can't.
Heather Armstrong learned a lesson from her experience. She stopped sharing her life on the internet for a while, but then she started again and focused on her family. Now she is a famous blogger and writes about her family.

'A long time ago, some scientists started to talk about a low-budget movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? It's a mix of documentary and drama that shows how much we don't know about the universe. This is true, even for the smartest scientists. Some scientists were worried about the movie and said it was wrong. They thought it was a bad film. But I didn't understand what all the fuss was about at first. The movie talked about new discoveries that showed the universe is strange and surprising. Then I saw some amazing things, like how water can change shape just by thinking about it. I had heard about this before, but I didn't believe it. The movie showed pictures of ice crystals that looked different when someone was happy or sad. Many people like this kind of evidence, but scientists want more proof. They want to know if it's really true. The movie also talked about other discoveries that are very surprising. Scientists are still learning new things, and we don't know everything. We might never know everything. Some scientists are trying to find a single answer to explain everything. But for now, the universe is still very amazing and surprising.'

Here is the rewritten text at the A1 level:
Writing books is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing books is like planting a big forest, and writing short stories is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me, and I like doing both. When I finish writing a book, I often want to write some short stories. When I finish writing a few short stories, I want to start a new book. I never write short stories while I'm writing a book, and I never write a book while I'm writing short stories. It takes some time to switch between the two. I started writing short stories in 1984. It was a bit tricky at first, but I liked it. It was like discovering new things about my writing. Readers liked my short stories too. One of my first short stories was called "Breaking Waves". It was in a book of short stories called "Tales from Abroad". I like writing short stories because they don't take long to finish. It usually takes me a week to write a good short story. It's not like writing a book, which takes a long time. With short stories, I can write something and then stop. I like writing short stories because I can make a story from a small idea or a word. It's like improvising music. If the story doesn't work out, I don't worry. I just try again. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver don't always write great short stories. I like that. I can learn from my mistakes and use them to write better stories. Writing short stories helps me when I write books too. It's like a practice session. Without short stories, I would find writing books even harder. My short stories are like small footprints I've left behind. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. Short stories are like messages from my heart, and I'm happy to share them with my readers.

'Science is a way of understanding the world around us. It helps us learn about the universe, from the smallest things to the biggest. Science can be beautiful and amazing, but it can also be complicated and confusing. Sometimes scientists disagree with each other, and old ideas are replaced by new ones. This has happened many times in history. Scientists are always trying to learn more, and they often make new discoveries that change our understanding of the world.
Science is important because it helps us make new things and solve problems. It has helped us cure diseases and make our lives easier. But it can also be used to harm the environment and our health. That's why it's important for everyone to understand science and its impact on our lives.
In the past, scientists thought they knew everything, but then new discoveries were made and they realized they didn't know as much as they thought. This is still happening today. Scientists are always learning and making new discoveries, and they need our help to make sure they use their knowledge wisely.
We need to be careful about how we use science because it can affect our future and the future of our planet. We can't just leave it to the scientists; we need to be involved and make sure we're making the right decisions.'

'E-books were very popular a few years ago. But now, some big publishers are saying that people are not buying as many e-books as they used to. This has made some people worried about the future of e-books. Some people think that e-books will replace printed books. But this is not true. Many people still like to read printed books. In the past, people were worried about new technologies like the radio, television, and the internet. They thought these would replace printed books. But they didn't. Instead, people found new ways to use these technologies.
We get attached to things like books, TVs, and computers. We feel a strong connection to them. When new technology comes out, it's like saying goodbye to something we love. That's why we often look back at old things and miss them. This is true for e-books too. Some people started to appreciate printed books again because they liked the way they feel and smell.
We like to tell stories about big changes like this. We use stories to understand and make sense of what's happening. We tell stories about things that are ending, like the end of a book. This story helps us think about how we feel about change and technology.'

Every day, I wake up at 5:30. I brush my teeth, make coffee, and write about how famous people did their work. I want to know how they organized their daily routine to be creative and productive. I think that by looking at the small details of their daily lives, we can learn more about their personalities and careers.
I believe that our daily routine says a lot about who we are. For example, what we eat and when we eat can tell us a lot about ourselves. I'm writing about how creative people spend their time, not just what they create. It's about how they make time for their work, not just the work itself.
I have some questions about how to be creative and earn a living. How can I do my best work and still have time for other things? Can I do a little bit of work each day, or should I focus on one big project? What can I give up to make time for everything I want to do?
I don't have all the answers, but I want to show how other successful people have handled these challenges. I want to show how they turned their ideas into small, daily tasks. I think that's the key to being creative and productive.
The book is called Daily Rituals, but I'm really writing about people's routines. A routine can be ordinary, but it can also be a way to be more productive and creative. A good routine helps us use our time and energy well.
I started this book because I was stuck writing a story and I was procrastinating. I started looking at how other writers work, and I found it interesting. I thought, "Someone should collect these stories and share them!" And that's how this book was born.
I've gathered many stories from books, articles, and interviews. I've tried to keep the stories short and interesting. I hope you enjoy reading about how creative people spend their time.

Howard became a scientist who studies fossils because of a change in his family's plans when he was six years old. His father had to cancel their summer holiday to Spain because of high interest rates. Instead, they went to the beach in England. On the beach, Howard found a special rock called an ammonite. He knew he wanted to be a scientist who studies fossils when he grew up.
As he got older, Howard became more interested in the very old fossils. He didn't like the big and famous fossils, but the small and special ones. He studied hard and got a degree. Then he looked for a job at a university. He was worried that he might not get the job he wanted.
Howard had an interview at a university in London. The person who was supposed to lead the interview was late because he had a fight with his wife. Howard had to interview with someone else, who didn't want him to get the job. But surprisingly, Howard got the job anyway.
Howard was happy to have the job, even though he didn't understand why he got it. He was grateful to have a job that he loved. Later, a colleague told him what really happened during the interview. Howard was a little disappointed, but he was happy to have the job.
Howard's life was calm and organized, but sometimes things didn't go as planned. One day, someone stole his bag with important papers for a lecture. Howard was very upset. He had to cancel the lecture and report the theft to the police. He went to get a coffee and met a colleague who was talking to a visitor from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard learned about a new collection of fossils that he could study. He decided to go to Nairobi to see the fossils, even though it was a big change in his plans.

Charles Spence is a professor who studies how we taste food. He eats many different foods, including ones that might seem strange, like ice cream made from bee larvae. He thinks that how we eat and what we eat with can affect how we taste food. For example, if we eat with someone else, we might eat more than if we eat alone.
Professor Spence and his team have done many experiments to learn more about how we taste food. They have found that the way we eat can affect the way we taste food. For example, if we eat with a fork and knife, we might taste the food differently than if we eat with our hands.
Professor Spence has written a book about his research. He has also worked with famous chefs and food companies to help them make better-tasting food. He thinks that music and sound can also affect how we taste food. For example, he has found that listening to happy music can make food taste sweeter.
Professor Spence's home is not fancy, but he likes to have fun with his family. They like to have dinner parties and try new foods. They might play games or use special lights to make the food taste better.

Our brains are very busy. We have a lot of information coming in from different sources. We need to sort out what is important and what we can ignore. We are also doing many things at the same time. In the past, people used to ask travel agents to book their flights and salespeople to help them find what they needed. Now we do these things ourselves. We are doing the work of many people, but we are also trying to take care of our daily lives, our families, our work, and our hobbies.
We use our smartphones to help us do all these things. But sometimes we think we are doing many things at once, but really we are just switching between them quickly. This can be bad for our brains. It makes us feel stressed and confused. We can't focus on one thing for long.
Scientists have found that when we do many things at once, we are not as efficient as we think. We make more mistakes and it takes us longer to finish tasks. We also feel tired and stressed. This is because our brains are not used to doing many things at once.
Some people think that multitasking is a good way to get things done quickly, but it's not. It's better to focus on one thing at a time. This way, we can do things better and feel less stressed.

There is a chimpanzee in a Swedish zoo named Santino. He breaks up concrete at night and throws it at visitors during the day. Is he being mean? In the US, some female bats help other bats when they need help. Are they being kind? People used to think animals just did things, and that was it. But now, scientists are studying animals to see if they feel things like humans do. They are looking at chimps, bats, rats, dolphins, and even chickens.
Some scientists think animals can feel things, like happiness and sadness. This makes people ask questions. Can animals think and make choices like humans do? This is a big question. Some people think we should stop eating meat because animals can think and feel. Others think we should just be kind to animals and not hurt them.
There was an experiment with cows that showed they like to solve problems. This makes us think about where we get our food from. Some people think we should stop eating meat because animals can feel things. Others think we should just be kind to animals and not hurt them.
The scientists have different opinions about this. Some think we should stop eating meat, while others think we should just be kind to animals. The problem is that it's hard to know for sure what animals are thinking and feeling.

'Critical thinking is a way to understand what we read or hear better. Some people think that arguing is a way to find the truth. Technology helps us store and process information, but it's changing how we think. We're exposed to more bad thinking, opinions, and ideas. This can be overwhelming. 
Many people think that reading is important for thinking. But now, people are reading less and less. This might be because they're spending more time watching TV and playing games. 
Some experts think that technology can be good or bad for our thinking. It depends on how we use it. For example, some games can help us think better, while others might make us think less. 
We need to understand how technology affects our thinking and learning. This is important because reading and math scores are going down. We need to look at technology in a different way and see how it helps or hurts our thinking.'

Matthew Crawford is a writer and a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office, but he didn't like it. He likes working with his hands and fixing things. His books are about how we should live and how to be happy. He wrote one book about the good things about working with your hands.
Matthew noticed that people are always looking at their phones and computers. He thinks this is making it hard for us to think and remember things. We are also becoming less friendly with each other. We used to talk to strangers, but now we don't.
Matthew thinks that our phones and computers are making us do things we don't want to do. We are always looking at screens and not talking to people. This is bad for our society.
Matthew wants to find a way to make things better. He thinks we should have rules to keep our public spaces quiet and peaceful. He also thinks we should do things that make us happy, like fixing things or playing sports. These things make us feel good and help us be happy.
When we do things like this, we are more focused and can pay attention to the people around us. This is important for our happiness and our relationships.

'What do you do for a living?' This is a common question we ask each other. When someone says they are a philosopher, it can be difficult to answer. Some people think that philosophers are special and know more than others. But this is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else. They think about life and try to understand it.
A long time ago, a Greek philosopher named Aristotle said that thinking deeply about life is the most important thing. Another Greek philosopher, Socrates, said that we should think about our lives and make sure they are good. This is important because it helps us make our own decisions.
Some people think that philosophers are too busy reading books and thinking about big ideas to be involved in everyday life. But this is not true. Philosophers can help us think about our daily lives and make good choices. They can help us understand why we do things and what is important to us.
I am a philosopher and my work is about ethics. Ethics is about what is right and wrong. Some people think that ethics is just about following rules, but it is more than that. It is about thinking about what is important and what is not. As a philosopher, I try to help people think about their lives and make good choices.

'Food is a big part of our lives. Some people love to think about what and how we eat. But, surprisingly, philosophers haven't talked much about food until recently. When they did talk about food, it was usually just a way to explain something else. Now, people are starting to think about food in a new way. Food is special because it's connected to our culture and community. We share food with others and it brings us together. Food critics, who write about food, are important because they help us understand what's good and what's not. But, they're not special because they can taste food better than others. They're just good at describing what they taste. 
Food is also beautiful, like art or music. Some people think that food should be considered art, but it's hard to do that because we eat it and it's gone. There are many questions about food, like what we should eat and how we should cook it. These questions can help us think about what's important to us. 
Cooking at home is different from cooking in a restaurant. When we cook at home, we cook for our friends and family, and we share food together. In a restaurant, the chef cooks for the people who own the restaurant, and they have to follow rules. Food can also help us understand other cultures. We can learn about new foods and people by sharing meals together. This is important in international relations and diplomacy.'

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He wanted to make board games more exciting. He thought, "Why can't games have a story? Why can't our choices affect the next game?" He took a classic game called Risk and changed it. Now, players make decisions that affect the game forever. They might tear up cards or damage the board. The game is played over several sessions, and players keep track of their progress.
Rob worked on a new game called Pandemic Legacy. It's a cooperative game where players work together to stop diseases. His next project was SeaFall, a game about sailing in the 16th to 19th centuries.
To make sure the story makes sense, game designers test the game with players. They want to see how players make choices and how the game changes over time. One player, Jaime, said it takes a lot of time to test the game. "Sometimes it works great, but sometimes it gets broken and we have to fix it."
Rob didn't think many people would like his idea. He thought it would be a niche game. But many people loved it! One player, Russell, said it's a big change in game design. "It's exciting to learn new things and discover new ways to play."
Another player, Ben, said the idea of an unfolding adventure is more important than worrying about the game lasting forever. "Most people don't watch the same movie twice, do they? We're buying into an experience."
Rob wants to see what others do with his idea. He thinks people will soon ask for something new. But Colby, the studio manager, thinks the legacy format is a game-changer. "It changes the way we think about board games."

'One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at a big aquarium in New Zealand. He climbed out of the water and went through a small pipe to the ocean. People loved the story and shared it online. It's fun to imagine animals doing human-like things. Octopuses are very smart, but they look very different from us. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play. Some people think it's not good to imagine animals are like us, but Dr. Frans de Waal says it's the opposite. He thinks we don't want to believe animals are smart like us. He studied animals and found that they can do many things we thought were special to humans, like thinking about the past and future, being kind, and understanding what others are thinking. Animals are smarter than we thought. A long time ago, people thought animals were smart and could even go to trial. Even Charles Darwin, who wrote about evolution, thought animals and humans were not that different. But then some scientists thought animals were just machines that responded to things. This changed how people thought about animals. Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals are smart in their own way. We can learn about their intelligence by testing them in special ways. For example, squirrels are good at remembering where they hide food. An octopus might test us on how many colors we can change our skin to. Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really escaped to the ocean, but he likes how the story made people think about animal intelligence. He did an experiment with monkeys and found out they can feel jealous. People loved the video of the experiment.'

'Robots are becoming more popular. They will change the way we work. Experts say that many jobs will be done by robots in the next few years. This will be a big change. Some people think that robots will only work in factories and offices, but they will be used in many other places too.
A company in Australia has made a robot that can lay bricks quickly. A company in the US has made a robot that helps in supermarkets. These robots can do jobs that humans used to do.
Some people think that robots will create new jobs for technicians and programmers. But others worry that robots will take away jobs from people. They say that robots can't replace the human touch.
A man named Dr. Zhang is an expert on robots. He says that in the next few years, robots will be able to work with other robots and with humans. He also says that many companies will need people who know how to work with robots.
Dr. Zhang thinks that people need to learn new skills to work with robots. He says that some jobs will disappear and new ones will appear. He also says that robots will be used in our homes and will be able to talk to us.
This is a big change and we need to be prepared. We need more people who know about science, technology, engineering, and maths (STEM) to work with robots.'

'Why do people climb mountains? One famous climber, George Mallory, said "Because it's there." This answer is simple, but it's not the only reason people climb. Some people love the feeling of freedom they get when they climb. But climbing can also be very hard and scary. 
A long time ago, a writer named Tejada-Flores wrote about climbing and said that there are different ways to climb, and each way has its own rules. Some people like to climb big mountains, while others like to climb smaller rocks. 
Some climbers say that they love climbing because it makes them feel free. But others say that climbing can be very confining, like being stuck in a small tent during a storm. 
A climber named Joe Fitschen asked a different question: "Why do people climb?" He said that climbing is in our nature, and we like to take risks and challenge ourselves. 
Another climber, Brian Treanor, said that climbing helps us develop good qualities like courage, humility, and respect for the environment. 
Some climbers like to climb alone, without help from others. They have to be very committed to their goal to succeed. 
Climbing can also be a way to connect with nature and be in the moment. It's like a kind of meditation. Some people even think that climbing is similar to the techniques used in Zen philosophy to find inner peace. 
So, why do people climb? There are many reasons, and each person may have their own answer.'

'Alfred Brendel was a famous pianist. He played classical music for many years. He was a serious person, but people who knew him said he had a playful side. He didn't teach many students, but he liked to write and play music. One day, a 14-year-old boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of his concerts. Kit was very good at playing the piano. Brendel was impressed and started teaching him. Kit is now 19 and still learning. He is good at many things, like math, computer code, and tennis. He also writes music. Brendel is proud of Kit's skills. He can listen to his own playing and understand what he does wrong. Brendel doesn't want people to expect too much from Kit. He says Kit is still learning and needs time to improve. Now, Brendel is 80 years old and has stopped performing. He is happy to have played music for so long and still likes to think about new pieces he wants to play.'

'I remember when I was a child, I thought all gardens were special and nice. My grandad's garden was near a river and was very peaceful. You couldn't see the river, but you could hear the water and the birds singing in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this. My grandad's garden was not special in a big way. He didn't have a big greenhouse like some of his friends. They made their own greenhouses from old windows. My dad was a quiet person, but he liked to make jokes. He had a special phrase he used, "It's immaterial to me". He wasn't very ambitious, but he was good at fixing things around the house. My parents moved house only once, but my mum liked to buy new furniture. We got a piano, but I was too scared to play it. My sister took lessons, but I never got to play. I loved the river and would go there with my imagination. I would walk along the river, looking for fish with my net. I wanted to leave school, but my dad found a job for me as a gardener. He didn't want me to do it, but he thought it might be good for me. I think he saw how much I loved gardening and wanted me to be happy.'

Lawrence MacEwen lives on a small island called the Isle of Muck. I visit him there. The weather is very windy and rainy. His dog, Tie, is very friendly. MacEwen shows me around the island. He points to another island, Eigg, and says it gets a lot more rain than Muck. We go down the hill to move his sheep. MacEwen tells me some facts about the island. It's a long, thin island and has geese that eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived here for 3,000 years.
MacEwen's son helps with the farm, his daughter runs a hotel, and his wife helps with the farm too. They all work together to make the island run smoothly. There is no electricity all the time, so we use candles and torches. I miss my phone, but it's okay because I'm on holiday.
One day, some musicians come to the island and play music. Everyone dances and has a great time. In the evening, MacEwen tells me how he met his wife. She came to the island to work on a farm and didn't know much about farming. She was good at typing, though! I go to bed and wake up to more rain. But I eat well because the food comes from the island. I even get fresh fish from a fisherman. I hope my ferry ride to the next island will be okay because some ferries have been cancelled due to bad weather.

'Long ago, the video game industry was not easy to get into. Many people thought it was just for young people who liked playing games. But now, the industry is growing and taking seriously. It's still hard to get into, but it's becoming more possible.
Jim, a person who writes about games, says it's hard to get a job at a big company or work on a famous game. But he says the industry needs more game designers, not just people who make big decisions, but also people who design small parts of the game.
Jim says the best way to get into the industry is to make games. You need to make something to get a job or to work on your own. Game design is like a hobby that you have to do to make it real.
John, another expert, says there are other ways to get into the industry. He says it's not just about making games, but also about being creative, having the right skills, and being able to work well with others.

They like different types of entertainment and art and culture. They might have worked for a few years before realizing that games are what they want to do.

'I like playing football since I was a child. My dad encouraged me to play. I had a friend who didn't like it because his dad was too bossy. My friend stopped playing football and never played again. I'm glad it didn't happen to me. When I score a goal, people say it's just luck, but I practiced a lot. I think it's important to practice to be good at something. I played many sports at school, but football was my favorite. Now I want to teach my son to enjoy learning skills. We're already reading books to him, but he likes to play with them instead of reading. I hope he doesn't like football too much like me. When I was a professional football player, our manager helped us younger players to play in the first team. We knew we had to work hard. We lost our first game, but we didn't give up. I rely on my friends and family. Sometimes people say I should help my parents more, but I think they're happy with what they do. I like to help them, but not too much. After I stop playing football, I want to take a break and do things I haven't done before, like skiing. I want to go skiing the day after I stop playing.'

We lived at Reef Point because of Sam Carter. He was my father's friend in Los Angeles. My father was having trouble writing because of the heat and the fog. Sam found a cheap place for us to live. The beach was not very popular because it was hard to get to. But in the summer, many people came to visit. My father was working hard to finish his book. I liked to sit on the beach and read with my dog, Rusty. Rusty was a stray dog who liked to dig and swim. He found things on the beach and brought them to me. Sometimes, he found things that didn't belong to him, and I had to give them back to their owners.
One day, my father went to Los Angeles to finish his book. Rusty and I went swimming. We saw some surfers riding the waves. One surfer was very good and caught my eye. She asked me why I didn't join them surfing. I said I didn't have a surfboard. She said I could buy one, but I didn't have money. She asked if my father was American. I said no, he was writing a book about America. She said she had read it and liked it. She looked at me with interest, and I thought that was how it was. People were friendly, but they didn't really care about me until I told them about my father's book.

Violet was at the dock in Southampton. She was waiting in a long queue to get on a ship called the Queen Caroline. She was worried because her friend Annie had told her to get there late, but Violet got there early. Suddenly, an announcement came over the loudspeaker saying that the computer system had broken down. The passengers were not happy. Some people tried to be patient, but most were getting angry. They had paid a lot of money for this trip and they wanted to enjoy it.
Violet was feeling annoyed. She couldn't find her phone and she was worried about it. She also thought that the whole idea of taking a cruise was a bad idea. She couldn't even call her son Harry to check if she had left her phone in a taxi because all her numbers were on the phone.
A nice couple behind her in the queue offered to let her use their phone to call her son. Violet asked them to ask her neighbor Kristina to check if the phone was left in her flat. Violet was relieved that she wouldn't be in trouble, but she didn't tell Harry. She was worried about getting to her room on the ship.
When she finally got to the ship, Violet was disappointed. The room was not as nice as she expected. She was relieved when she found out that she had a balcony, though. She had been worried that she wouldn't have one.

John Maloof bought a box of old photos at an auction. He was looking for pictures for a book about a neighborhood in Chicago. Instead, he found 30,000 photos taken by a photographer named Vivian Maier. She took pictures of people, children, and the city. Maloof has a lot of her work, including cameras, film, and negatives. He is trying to learn more about Maier's life and work.
Maier was born in New York and lived in France as a child. She moved to Chicago to work as a nanny. She always carried a camera with her and took pictures of everything. She was a private person, but she liked to talk about movies and politics. She was very good at photography and took many pictures of people, especially women, children, and old people.
Maloof is trying to show the world how good Maier's work is. He wants to put her in the history books. He thinks her pictures are very special and wants to share them with everyone.

'Eleanor Catton is a young writer from New Zealand. Her book, The Luminaries, is a big book with many characters. It's a mystery story about a group of men who try to solve some crimes in New Zealand a long time ago. The book is very complex, but it's also very interesting. Eleanor Catton said she wanted to make the book fun to read. She likes to write about New Zealand and its beautiful landscape. She's very happy to be a writer and to have people read her book. She might even write for TV one day.'

Jonny Kinkead is a man who loves guitars. When he was a boy, he used to play with guitars in his dad's garage. Now, he makes his own guitars by hand. Jonny loves guitars because they can make beautiful sounds. He thinks it's amazing that you can make different sounds by using different types of wood.
Jonny started playing the guitar when he was 11. Then, he wanted to learn the bass guitar. He didn't buy one, he made it himself. He learned how to make guitars by studying and experimenting. His brothers and he used to build model boats and planes, so he was used to working with his hands.
After school, Jonny studied architecture, but he didn't like it. He wanted to make things that people use, not just buildings. He started making guitars again and realized that it's like sculpting, but you make music with it. He thought it was a better idea than just making art.
Jonny has been making guitars for 40 years. At first, he sold them for the cost of the materials. But as he got better, he could sell them for more money. He still makes only about 10 guitars a year, so he doesn't earn a lot. He had to work hard to get known, going to music festivals and talking to musicians.
Jonny thinks it's easier for new guitar-makers today. People now know that UK-made guitars are good too. He says that you can learn some things in school, but you also need to try things and make mistakes. That's how he learned.

'Talking about the weather is a common way to start a conversation in English. This is because it's a traditional way to talk to each other. Many people say that when two English people meet, they talk about the weather first. This is still true today.
Some people try to explain why English people like talking about the weather so much. But they often get it wrong. They think that English people are really interested in the weather. But that's not true. We don't talk about the weather because we love it. We talk about it because it's a way to be polite and friendly.
For example, when we meet someone new, we might say, "Nice day, isn't it?" or "It's cold today, isn't it?" These are not really questions about the weather. They are just a way to start a conversation. It's like saying "hello" or "how are you?"
There are three times when we usually talk about the weather. We might use it as a greeting, to break the ice and start talking about something else. We might use it when we're not sure what to say next and need a little time to think. And we might use it when we're with someone and there's an awkward silence.
That's why people might think that English people love talking about the weather all the time. But really, it's just a way to be friendly and polite. We don't talk about the weather because we're obsessed with it. We talk about it because it's a way to connect with each other.'

Alice Leader is a teacher. She took her students to see the old Roman wall in England. The wall is very old and very long. The students were interested, but they wanted to know why it was built. Alice didn't know the answer, so she decided to write a story about it. She had never written a book before, but she wanted to tell a story that would help her students understand what life was like a long time ago.
Alice was a teacher for 31 years. She loved teaching, but it was hard work. Writing a book was a new adventure for her. She wrote her first book about a Roman family and their baby. The other students on the writing course liked her story and told her to publish it. Alice's husband, Zachary, is a good editor. He helps her make her writing better.
Alice wants to write books that are interesting and fun for children. She thinks that many books for children are too serious or too fantastical. She wants to write books that are just right. She loves teaching and writing because it makes her happy. She likes seeing her students learn and grow.

'Two brothers, Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, are famous for being good at triathlons. A newspaper and a TV company asked them to take part in a special race. Jonny would drive a car, and Alistair would ride a bike. They started at a lake in the mountains and had to get to the highest road. Jonny was excited because he liked the view and it was cold, so he could stay warm in the car. Alistair was confident because he had seen Jonny drive before and thought he might not make it. They started the race, and Alistair rode his bike up a big hill. Jonny drove his car on the road. They would meet again at the finish line. Who would get there first?
Jonny had a problem when a big tractor came out of a field. Alistair had to carry his bike up the hill because it was too steep. He walked with the bike and then rode it again. Finally, he reached the top of the hill. Jonny had to drive slowly because the roads were narrow and had a stream on it. Alistair was almost at the finish line. He rode his bike fast and stopped just in time. Jonny drove to the finish line and said, "Well done, Alistair. I'm disappointed."'

'When I play tennis at Wimbledon, I notice the silence. The ball bounces quietly on the grass. I hear my own shots and the echo. The quiet helps me focus. I try to forget everything except the game. But sometimes, the crowd cheers and claps. I hear it, but it's far away. I'm so focused, I don't think about the people watching me from all over the world.
I've always dreamed of playing at Wimbledon. My coach, my uncle, told me it's the biggest tournament. I was 14 when I first played here. I lost to Roger Federer two years ago. Last year, I was very sad. I cried a lot because I knew I could have won. My coach told me not to cry, that I would have another chance. And now, here I am again.
I'm more confident this time. I learned from my mistakes. I know I can win. We didn't talk about the match at dinner last night. I was already thinking about the game in my head. From now on, I need to focus.'

'Jane Goodall is a famous scientist who lived in Africa. She was very excited to be there and said, "I am living in the Africa I have always dreamed of!" She spent most of her life in Africa and became known for her work with chimpanzees. In 1963, a big organization in Britain made a TV show about her and her research. She wrote books for children and adults, and people loved reading about her adventures. Jane Goodall is very famous, but some people don't know how much she really achieved. She did many important things, like finding out that chimpanzees eat meat and use tools. She also showed that chimpanzees are smart and can feel emotions like humans do. Jane Goodall's work changed the way people think about animals and ourselves. When she was a little girl, she was very curious and liked to ask questions. One day, she hid in a henhouse to see how hens lay eggs. This might have been the start of her love for animals and her career as a scientist.'

Shirley Ford is a voice actor. She can do many different voices. She talks like a boy, a tired mom, an old lady, and even a fast-talking alien! She has worked on many projects, like cartoons and educational videos. She has to learn new voices for each project. Sometimes she has to do voices for small children. She collects new voices by watching children's TV.
Shirley started acting when she was a student. She did some singing jobs and then tried voice acting. She got a big part in a cartoon and realized she was good at it. She has worked hard to get where she is today. She says it's important to be persistent and have a good showreel (a recording that shows what she can do). She also recommends attending special workshops for voice actors.

Many people ask me how I became a cartoonist. It's a job that people dream about when they are young, like being a pilot. But most people grow up and choose more realistic jobs, like being a doctor or a teacher. It's hard to believe that you can make a living by drawing simple pictures. But some people do it. To become a cartoonist, you don't need to go to university, you don't need a lot of money, and you don't even need to be a good artist. You just need to have a brain, a hand, and something to draw with. But it's not easy to be a cartoonist. You need to be very good at drawing and writing. I've done many different types of cartoons, like political cartoons and comic strips. I've also written books and designed things. It's good to be smart, read a lot, and be curious about the world. But the most important thing is to be good at selling your work. Many cartoonists used to have a regular job drawing cartoons for newspapers and magazines. Now, most cartoonists have to sell their own work. If you're good at selling, you will do well. I've seen people who are not very good at drawing but are very good at selling do better than people who are very good at drawing but not very good at selling. Some people are very worried about someone stealing their ideas. But you can protect your work by writing a 'c' in a circle and putting your name and date next to it. If someone steals your cartoon and it becomes popular, it's not the end of the world. It can even be a lucky break!

Twenty years ago, I moved to a new house and threw away an old electric guitar that my dad gave me for my 16th birthday. I felt bad about getting rid of it, but I thought it was old and useless. A man at the dump asked me if I was going to throw it away. I said yes, but he wanted it. I gave it to him and we went our separate ways. Later, I felt sad about giving it away.
A few months ago, I received an email from a man named Keith. He said he had my old guitar. He found it and thought it was mine because of a name tag on the back. He wanted to sell it back to me. I was so happy to see it again! I was going to give him a lot of money, but he asked for a fair price.
My dad wanted me to learn classical guitar, but I didn't like it. I switched to electric guitar and played simple songs. Now, I'm learning again and it feels great! My fingers remember how to play chords. I might start a band with my son, who plays the saxophone. We could call it "The Regainers"!

'Sleep is very important for our bodies and minds. When we don't sleep well, we can feel tired, grumpy, and have trouble concentrating. Some people have trouble sleeping and they know how important it is to get a good night's rest. But what about dreams? We don't talk about dreams as much. When we wake up, we often remember our dreams from the last hour or two of sleep. This is because our brains are most active during this time.
Dreams can help us be creative and think in new ways. Some people, like artists and writers, use their dreams to get ideas. They might write or draw something after having a dream. But everyone can use their dreams to think creatively. We all need to be able to think in new ways to solve problems and make good decisions. So, we should take our dreams seriously and try to understand them.'

'Twenty years ago, Susie Ray moved from London to a small town by the sea. When you visit her studio, you see many empty frames on the walls. There are also pictures of her two daughters. Susie is a very good artist who copies famous paintings. She can make them look just like the originals. People like Renoir, Monet, and Van Gogh painted the originals. Susie's copies are so good that art experts think they are the real thing. People buy her copies for a few hundred pounds to £12,000, depending on how long she takes to finish them. Susie doesn't tell us who her clients are, but they are galleries and collectors. Some people buy her copies to show off, but others keep the original in a safe and display the copy. Susie is honest about what she does. She makes her copies look as good as possible, but she always signs her name on the back. She doesn't make fake copies, because that is against the law. Susie used to work as an illustrator for a garden, drawing plants. She is very good at drawing and making things look accurate. Now, she makes copies of famous paintings, especially those by French artists like Monet and Van Gogh. People ask her for advice, and she tells them to practice drawing and to make sure they get things right. She likes making copies, and it's a good way for her to make a living.'

Ellen MacArthur loves the sea. She used to sail around the world fast. She was very good at it. Ellen's life was all about the sea. She spent most of her time on the water. When she was on land, people would ask her about her sailing and she would want to go back to the sea. After a big sailing competition, she spent 94 days on her boat. It was her home, her work place, and her safe place. She had to plan everything carefully, including what food to eat and how to stay healthy. She was very good at taking care of her boat.
Ellen realized that the world is like a boat. We need to take care of it. She saw this when she visited a desolate island in the Atlantic. She saw old whaling stations and realized that people take things and then leave. This made her think about the world and how we use things. She started talking to people about using less and reusing things. She visited factories, mines, and power stations to learn more. She wants to help young people think about how to make the world a better place.
Ellen started a charity to help people think about how to live sustainably. She misses sailing, but she thinks this new work is more important. She wants to use her voice to make a difference.

'Jordan Romero is 13 years old. He wants to climb Mount Everest, the highest mountain in the world. If he does, he might become famous. Jordan wants to inspire other young people to go outside and play. He's climbing with his parents, Paul and Karen. They call themselves 'Team Romero'. They want to climb the highest mountains on each continent. Jordan has already climbed five of them. He might finish all seven before he's 18.
Some people think it's not a good idea for a 13-year-old to climb Everest. They think Jordan might not be strong enough or experienced enough. But Jordan's parents are experienced climbers and think they can help him. They are worried about the risks, but they believe in Jordan.
Jordan's father says he's not trying to be famous because of his son's adventures. He just wants Jordan to achieve his goal. Jordan says he likes the challenge. He wants to inspire other young people to go outside and play.
Some people think that in the past, people didn't care about being the first to do something. But now, people like to share their adventures on the internet. This means Jordan has to be careful about how he does things. He has to do interviews and take pictures. He has to make his adventure special. If he doesn't want to climb mountains anymore, his parents will stop the project and do something else together.'

'When you see a teenager with an MP3 player, it's probably not classical music they're listening to. Most people know many pop group names, but few know who Brahms was. I'm studying music, but my friends don't know much about classical music. If you don't know who wrote the music, you won't buy their CDs. It's sad for classical music lovers. Few people go to classical concerts. Only 3% of concert tickets sold last year were for classical music. Classical music doesn't interest most people, especially teenagers. I'm a musician, but I don't love classical music. I like many types of music. Why don't teenagers like classical music? It's hard for us to listen to because it's slow and has many changes. We like to talk and play fast. Pop music is easy to listen to, and classical music needs time and attention. Pop music is about things that happen in our lives. Classical music is powerful, but not about what we care about. We don't listen to classical music as much anymore. In the past, families made music together, but now we can find any music on the internet. I don't know why people like classical music more when they're older. But if your parents like something, you might not like it. Some people think schools are to blame, but there are kids who like playing classical music in school. They like performing, but not listening to it. We have different music for relaxing and for playing.'

Bonnie Wyndham got out of her mother's car and looked at Almonside School. 'I'll show you who's boss,' she said. Her mother was getting out of the car too, but Bonnie didn't care if she heard. Bonnie's mother knew how she felt.
The school was a bit strange, with many different buildings hidden among the trees. But Bonnie saw some signs that said 'Science block', 'gymnasium', and 'riding centre'. 'Riding centre!' Bonnie said excitedly. 'Let's go,' her mother said.
Bonnie followed her mother to the headmaster's office. 'This way,' her mother said. Bonnie sat outside the door while her mother talked to the headmaster. Bonnie didn't like waiting, so she got up and went to the riding centre. She saw some nice horses and a big place for riding inside. But there was no one around.
Bonnie was very careful with the horses. She liked them a lot. She looked at each horse and liked them all. 'I think I know what they're doing here,' she said to a small pony. 'They're happy and healthy.'
The next horse caught her eye. 'You're the best!' she said. His name was Maverick. Bonnie felt like she knew him. 'I rode you in my dreams,' she said. She wanted to ride him again. She found a saddle and bridle and put them on Maverick. She forgot about her mother and the headmaster. When she rode Maverick outside, she felt like a queen. 'You're the best horse I've ever ridden,' she said. 'We can be friends,' she said to Maverick. She rode him around the paddock and felt happy. Maverick trusted her, and she knew he would jump well.

'I met Cody Simpson before and I was impressed by his confidence. He's a 15-year-old boy from Australia who has already made many popular songs. So, how did he end up singing in front of so many people? 'I started playing the guitar when I was six years old and writing songs when I was seven,' Cody says. 'But I loved swimming and surfing. Those were my favorite things. I was 13 and going to school, and then I put some videos online.' These videos were very popular. People liked them and wanted to see more. So, Cody recorded more videos at home and sent them online. The response was amazing. Cody was a good swimmer and was training hard. But then some record labels contacted him and asked him to join them. He had to decide between swimming and singing. He chose singing and moved to the US with his family. 'It was hard for me to choose a career at such a young age,' he says. 'Imagine having to decide what you want to do for the rest of your life when you're only 12 or 13 years old!' He had to tell his swimming coach and friends that he was leaving. 'They were surprised,' he says. 'I'm a quiet person and I like to keep a low profile.' So, Cody packed his bags and moved to the US with his family. They are not involved in his music career, but they are always there for him. Cody says it's important to have good people around you to keep you grounded. Sometimes, he worries about his little brother and sister who are affected by his decision. But his family reassures him that they are always there to support him. Success comes from being brave and taking chances. 'It all happened so fast and unexpectedly,' Cody says. 'Now, I'm singing in front of many people and visiting countries I never thought I'd visit. It's amazing, but I know it won't last forever.'

I woke up early and looked out of my window. I saw a river and some ice on it. The sun was shining. I could see a wall of sandbags along the river to protect the buildings from flooding. I had helped build them with the other adults in the town.
I was going kayaking. I put on my special suit and grabbed my jacket. I saw a boy on the other side of the river. He was trying to balance on the ice. I didn't know him. I checked my lucky chain and put it in my pocket. It was given to me by my famous grandfather. I also have his diary, which I keep under my pillow.
I went to the kitchen to get a banana. My mom was making breakfast. She asked me to be careful when I go kayaking. I saw my grandfather in the hallway. He was grumpy and asked me where I was going. I told him I was going kayaking. He didn't like it when I didn't win a competition. I tried not to get upset and went outside.
I walked to the boathouse to get my kayak.

'Mum took Jess to the study. "Come with me," she said. Jess followed her. There was a painting on the table. It was one of Grandpa's, but it was different from his other paintings. "Do you know about this?" Mum asked. Jess shook her head. "I've never seen it before. I didn't know he was working on something." The painting was of a river. It was a strange and beautiful picture. There were no animals, no birds, no people. It felt right that way. But Jess was curious. She thought about autumn after a long, warm summer. Mum said, "It has a name." There was something in her voice that wasn't quite right. Jess knew why. Grandpa never gave his paintings names. Mum turned the picture over and showed Jess the words Grandpa had written. Jess read them out loud: "River Boy." The words seemed important, but Jess didn't know why. There was a mystery. She looked at Mum. "There is no boy." Mum said, "It's strange. He usually doesn't give his paintings names. Maybe he will add a boy later." Jess knew what Grandpa would say. He would say that the artist doesn't need to explain the painting. The painting has its own life and language, and we either understand it or we don't. Mum said she asked Grandpa about the painting, but he told her not to waste her time asking him to explain it. He said artists have too much work to do already.'

"I woke up this morning and didn't mean to cut a hole in my carpet. I didn't trip or anything, but maybe I could have. I was trying to put a special cabinet in my room, but it didn't fit. My grandmother gave it to me, and it's very nice. It's small and white with pink and blue flowers. I keep my shells and rocks in it. I was excited to get it, but it's a corner cabinet, so it needs to be in a corner. My room is small and triangular, so I only have two corners. My sister and brother have bigger rooms, and when they go to university, I might get their rooms. But my sister is still young, so I might be stuck in my small room for a while. I like my room, it's cozy and I like the sloping roof and the window at floor level. The problem is, there's no space for the cabinet. I thought about cutting a small hole in the carpet to make room for it. My dad would be proud of me because he always tells us to think outside the box. And that's what I did!"

"The book 'The Borrowers' is about a family of tiny people who live in a house and take things from the big people who live there. When I directed a TV show based on the book, I knew it would be hard to make it good. People who love the book have strong ideas about how it should be done. I used the original pictures from the book to help me. The author wanted the show to be from the Borrowers' point of view, not from the humans'. This made filming more difficult. The most important thing was getting the size right. The Borrowers are 10 times smaller than humans, so we had to film them 10 times further away. When filming the big people, the crew had to crawl on the floor. We never raised the cameras high up except for a few shots. One big problem was making the shadows look right when we combined the tiny Borrowers with big backgrounds. We found a special way to do this. After the show was finished, a famous director, George Lucas, called me to ask how I did it. We built a special set for the Borrowers' home under the floorboards. It was very strange. The actors had to carry big objects, like giant scissors, and they laughed a lot. We had to stop filming sometimes because they were laughing so much. There's a scene where the Borrowers go down a drain. The actors had to go down a tunnel with water and they were very scared. I wanted to get the costumes right. I made them out of thick material so they looked like doll clothes. This made it hard for the actors to move around. They couldn't sit down or take off their clothes. The weather was very hot during filming, and the actors didn't thank me for the costumes! Most of the action happened away from the Borrowers' home, so we filmed them in front of a blue screen. It was hard for them to react to things that weren't there. I drew pictures of every scene to show people what it should look like. I drew 2,000 pictures! We had to work fast and hard, and sometimes we made mistakes. But it all worked out in the end, and I think the show was successful."

My mom stops the car at my new school, Palm Grove High School. She looks around nervously. She doesn't want anyone to see us. I tell her everything will be okay. She gives me a kiss and leaves. I get out of the car and go to the school office. I tell the secretary my name is Desert McGraw. She types it on her computer. I want to meet new friends who don't know my famous dad. My dad is a musician. I want to be normal for a change.
I go to my first class, English Literature. I'm late, but I find the classroom and sit down. The teacher, Ms. Smigla, says hello. She gives us a book to read and we can talk to each other. I sit next to a girl named Becca. She likes my shoes. I tell her thank you. She asks me why I moved here. I say my dad had to move for work. She asks what he does. I say he's an artist. That's true, but I don't want to tell her he's a famous musician.
I made some changes to the original text to make it easier for a learner of level A1 to understand. I:
* Simplified vocabulary and sentence structures
* Removed complex sentences and phrases
* Changed some sentences to make them shorter and more concise
* Removed some details that are not essential to the story
* Kept the main ideas and plot intact to ensure the learner can still understand the story and answer questions about it.

'American teenagers have a lot of responsibilities. They are expected to do well in school, have a part-time job, volunteer, and have a social life. They don't have time to just sit around and do nothing. Many people think that teenagers are lazy, but this is not true. They have a lot of work and activities to do. They have homework, tests, and extra activities at school, and they also have to help at home and have a social life. Some people think that teenagers spend too much time on their phones, but this is not always true. Many teenagers use their phones to help them with their work and to stay in touch with their friends and family. Teenagers have a lot of pressure, but they are still able to find time to help others. They volunteer and do things that make a positive difference in their community. In the future, there will be another generation of teenagers who will prove that the negative stereotypes about them are not true.'

'The Earth to Sky Calculus Club is a group of teenagers who live in a small town called Bishop. They love to send balloons to the edge of space. They have sent over 50 balloons so far! It's a fun project that combines science and adventure. I went with them one weekend to help launch a new balloon. They put a special box with a camera, a thermometer, and a GPS tracker on the balloon. The box will float up, up, up until it reaches the edge of space. Then it will come back down and the students will find it using the GPS tracker.
The students were very excited to launch the balloon. They counted down from five and then the balloon went up, up, up. They followed it with flashlights to see it in the sky. It was very quiet and peaceful. The students were amazed by the beauty of the sky.
After the launch, some students went home, but a few stayed to look for shooting stars. They lay on blankets on the mountain and looked up at the sky. It was very clear and you could see many stars. One student fell asleep in his sleeping bag.
The balloon will come back down to Earth and the students will find it the next day. It might take a long time to get to it because the area is very wild and there are no houses or roads nearby. The students like the adventure of finding the balloon and the box. They have only lost two boxes in 53 launches.
The students are very good at finding the boxes because they know the area well. It took them 11 hours to find this one. It was in a beautiful canyon with a waterfall. The camera didn't take any pictures of shooting stars, but the students were happy to talk about the science of the balloon and the stars.'

Chloe Morgan didn't like science when she was young. But one day, she helped her brother with a school project and read an article about dinosaurs. She was very interested and decided to learn more.
Chloe met a famous scientist, Matt Cornelius, who was kind and patient. He helped her understand more about dinosaurs. She was happy to talk to him and learn from him.
People often think that scientists in movies and TV shows are weird or silly. But Chloe says that's not true. Scientists are normal people who work hard to learn about the world. They spend time digging for fossils, studying them, and writing about what they find.
Chloe likes to explain science to people, especially children. She thinks it's important to help them understand and be interested in science. She even helped make a TV show about dinosaurs, called Walking with Dinosaurs. She checked that the dinosaurs shown in the show were accurate and existed at the same time.
Chloe thinks dinosaurs are still popular because they are exciting and remind us that there is still much to discover in the world. She loves her job as a palaeontologist and feels lucky to be able to learn about dinosaurs every day.

Here is a simplified version of the text for a learner of English at the A1 level:
"When you're going on a car trip with your family, you know you're not there yet, even if you ask 'Are we there yet?' many times. And when you finally get there, it's not 'there' anymore, it's 'here'. So, you should ask 'Are we here yet?' instead. Parents get tired of answering this question many times during a long car trip. They have to give juice and cookies to the kids, adjust the music and temperature, and keep everyone happy. Sometimes, kids get bored and want to do something else. They might even fight with each other. Parents try to keep the peace and make sure everyone is safe. Sometimes, they even play tricks on the kids to make them laugh. When you finally arrive at your destination, you know it because the parents get out of the car and go away from the kids. So, if the parents are still near, the answer is 'no, you're not there yet'."

'John and Zuzi Morgan have a café in Oxford where people can play board games and have a cup of coffee. They want people to have fun and want to come back again. Zuzi says, "We want to bring people together to play games. Everyone is busy with their phones and gadgets. We want to make it easy to talk and have fun with friends." They have special games called "Eurogames" that are easy to understand and fun to play. These games are about building things and trading with friends. One popular game is called Catan. Players work together to build things on an island and help each other. Matt Leacock, a game designer, created a game called Pandemic where players work together to solve problems. He was inspired by another game called Lord of the Rings. He wanted to make a game that would make people feel good, whether they win or lose. Now, many people play board games with friends and family. This is a way to have fun and be together in the same room. John and Zuzi's café is very popular because people like to play games with friends and have fun together.'

'Jamie Scott is a famous music writer and producer. He has written many popular songs in the UK. Jamie's story is about how important it is to keep trying and never give up. He started playing the guitar when his mother, who was a great singer, taught him. The music he listened to growing up was old songs on the radio. He didn't hear any modern music until he was 12. At the same time, he had to choose between playing tennis and playing music. He chose music because he loved it more. Jamie left school at 17 to try to become a performer. He wrote songs and played the piano every day. His parents told him to make it happen in 18 months or he would have to get a job. Jamie worked hard and finally got signed to a music publisher when he was 19. But he didn't become famous as a singer. Instead, he became famous as a songwriter. He writes songs for other artists and helps them become famous. Jamie believes that writing songs that people love is important. He says that it's okay to want to write a song that many people will like. He just wants to write the best songs he can.'

Where should we look for our thoughts? Some people think that thinking happens only in our heads. But I think that's not true. Our thoughts are connected to the things around us. We use things to help us think and learn. This is true from the earliest times to now.

Some experts think that home advantage is because of the crowd. When the crowd cheers, it can make the players feel more confident and strong. But, some research shows that this might not be true. In one study, referees watched a game with and without crowd noise. They found that the referees were more likely to make decisions that helped the home team when they heard the crowd noise.
Other experts think that home advantage is because of the players' feelings. They feel more comfortable and safe at home. This can help them play better. But, some sports, like baseball, don't have as much home advantage as others, like basketball.
One more idea is that home advantage is because of something deep inside us. It's like a feeling of protection for our home. This feeling can make us want to do better and fight harder when we're at home.
**Questions:**
1. Why do people think sports teams do better at home?
2. What do scientists and money people want to know about home advantage?
3. Why do you think the crowd cheering might help the players?
4. What did the referees find out in the study about crowd noise?
5. Why might home advantage be different in different sports?
